column5: Well with things warming up for my Southern brothers it won't be too long before those pesky black bears start stirring. No better time than now for this public awareness video on what to do should you be attacked by a bruin while on your travels to a secret back lake looking for old marble eyes or brookies.
Thats a fun way to promote bear safety fer sure.
They forgot thge most important tip, take a slower running friend with you.
Good advice. Last time I had my head ripped off by a bear it hurt like hell.
